name: flashpaper
description: FlashPaper is a secure self-destructing messaging service built for privacy. It lets users share encrypted notes that expire after reading, with no account required. Ideal for sensitive short-lived communication.
features: Secure Messaging: Self-destructing notes, Encrypted messages, Expire after reading. Privacy-focused communication.
No Account: Anonymous sharing. No registration required.
Short-Lived: Messages disappear automatically. Temporary communication.
Sensitive Data: Perfect for passwords and secrets. Secure sharing.
One-Time View: Read once and gone. Maximum security.
Password Protection: Optional extra security. Controlled access.
Simple UI: Clean interface. Easy to use.
Self-Hosted: Run your own instance. Complete privacy.
No Logging: Messages aren't stored. True ephemeral.
